title: Something needs to be done about this game

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Rant time!

I had an Auerlion who seemed like he was here for a week only and was not even playing well enough for bots. I had a Lee who asked "Can I make my mouse clicks bigger?". Than proceeded to state he had taken this game from his friend, than went AFK.

WTF can I do to try and win games here, seriously, look at the shit I get matched with. I really want to know why I keep getting sub-par players in my games? There has to be a reason why I keep getting players like this.

My personal MMR cannot be that high that I keep getting players who have no fucking brains.

replies.body: Don't expect random team mates to be good. if you don't have anyone to play with you are always rolling the dice on RANDOM teams.
This is 100% true. Make a premade team so you don't get stuck with these randoms!

i'd like to point out that assuming that you aren't one of these people
it is more likely the enemy team will have these players than your team as there are only 4 random people on your team, but 5 on theirs and therefore overall the enemy team should have more afk's and such
You tend to get players of a similar MMR to your own
